channel.title: Hearts of Wulin One-Shot (10/14)
channel.description:
I have one seat open in my Thursday 2PM Eastern (UTC-4) one-shot session of *Hearts of Wulin: Wedding of Flame and Fortune*. It's free and part of GCOG.
https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Mj1J4O2p9y47yyspSeC
